mapper.select: select count(*) target,separtment, job_no,name,SUM(case when valid = 1 then 1 else 0 end) count ,(SUM(case when valid = 1 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*)) rate from ( select emp.email,sep.separtment,gl.valid ,gl.certification_no ,sep.job_no,sep.name from separtment sep right join employee emp on sep.separtment = emp.separtment left join global gl on emp.email = gl.email where emp.active = 1 and emp.position not like 'Operator%' and emp.cost_category = 'DL' order by name) etmp GROUP BY separtment, job_no,name order by rate desc,count desc,target desc
